A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a Huge star wars fan.  Read books\, watched all of the clone wars series\, etc etc and I wanted to walk out with 20 minutes left.  I just completely stopped caring.  They cycle through the pattern of: \"main characters in peril\" - \"oh no\" - \"someone 'unexpected' comes heroically to the rescue\" - \"cue some kind of yippy!\" - no way the rotten tomato critics weren't paid off.
